record.title: Development and validation of a machine learning-based nomogram for predicting prognosis in lung cancer patients with malignant pleural effusion.
record.subjects: Nomograms ; Lung Neoplasms complications ; Lung Neoplasms pathology ; Lung Neoplasms mortality ; Lung Neoplasms diagnosis ; Pleural Effusion, Malignant diagnosis ; Pleural Effusion, Malignant pathology ; Pleural Effusion, Malignant mortality ; Machine Learning ; Humans ; Female ; Male ; Middle Aged ; Prognosis ; Aged ; Retrospective Studies ; Adult
record.abstract: Declarations. Competing interests: The authors declare no competing interests. Ethics approval and consent to participate: The study was approved by the Medical Ethics Committee of Affiliated Hospital of North Sichuan Medical College with file number 2023ER423-1. Informed consent was waived due to the retrospective nature of the study, where data was sourced from the hospitalâ€™s electronic medical records and electronic health check databases.
record.contributors: Hu, Xin ; Zhao, Shiqiao ; Li, Yanlun ; Heibi, Yiluo ; Wu, Hang ; Jiang, Yongjie
